email.title: Email address
email.info: Do you want to use a different email address? Change your email address by clicking on the button below. Note: you cannot log back in until you have confirmed the email address.

password.title: Password
password.info: Do you want to change the password? Change your password by clicking on the button below. Note: you will need your current password.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.info: Edit your own profile or, as a parent or legal representative, add the profile of your child aged up to 17 years.

emailReminders.title: Weekly email and newsletter
emailReminders.info: You can opt to stop receiving the weekly reminder email or the newsletter.

defaultLanguage.title: Language
defaultLanguage.info: You can change the language here.

deletion.title: Unsubscribe / withdraw consent
deletion.warning:
If you unsubscribe / withdraw consent, your account data will be deleted.
After the account has been deleted, we will no longer be able to link information you have provided (such as age and symptoms) to you.
